title: Miser's purse
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: knotted netting with beads
description: Netted purse of dark brown silk with a dark green zigzag band on each side,  meeting an area of dark green silk on either side.  The green silk is decorated and outlined with cut steel beads in a zigzag pattern.  Two small steel rings control closing; cut-out steel drops at each end.
name: Miser's purse
